name: Two Worlds (itch) (oathmilks)
description:
O, hero! Please help us reconnect the two worlds.

The two worlds was once connected, until... it doesn't. Your goal is to find the four orbs hidden in each world. You can choose world to play. Light world will require you to jump/dash and avoid dangers along the way while the dark world is unforgiving. Your best bet is to set up mini-tower to light your way, avoid being poisoned and chased by the monster. Good luck on your journey!

Control:

  • [WASD] and [Arrow Keys] to move
  • [Space] to jump (in light world)
  • [F] to place mini-tower (in dark world)
  • [F] to interact with relic once the orbs collected
